topics.title: [SOLVED] - App shows different plan workout than Website

questions.pain_point: Inability to view calendar in the app.
questions.question_content: Is there a way to see the calendar in the iphone app ? Thanks, Scott
questions.response_content: We are also in the process of adding the calendar right now, just like the web but for now once you activate your calendar you can see the plan on the workouts/plan tab.
questions.user_language: {"see the calendar","iphone app"}

questions.pain_point: N/A
questions.question_content: Got it - Thanks!! I activated “My Calendar” and now I see the correct workout on my app. Also, now when I click on “Workouts” it shows me the list of workouts with their dates - which is basically the calendar view I was looking for. Thanks for the fast responses!
questions.response_content: No response needed as user confirmed resolution.
questions.user_language: {"activated “My Calendar”","see the correct workout","calendar view"}

questions.pain_point: Discrepancy in heart rate zone calculations between devices.
questions.question_content: I do not think that has been asked before but whoop introduced zone training in their app. The HR zones do not match my garmin. They use this formula Target HR Intensity Zone = ((Max HR − Resting HR) × %Intensity) + Resting HR If i use their zone system, my zone 2 limits are not the same as my garmi
questions.response_content: Zones are a made up concept for the most part Their are a lot of different definitions and many analytics systems lets you define your own zone ranges. Garmin for example does. Zone 2 is what ever you

questions.pain_point: Connection issues with Garmin Edge and Direto.
questions.question_content: Yes, if Garmin Edge kicks in too fast, TD loses the connection. So, my final “official” (ehm…) workaround today is: Power on your Direto Open TD app Wait for Direto and TD to connect via BLE (after a few seconds, you can actually hear Direto hanshaking) Start a workout on TD Power on your Garmin Edg
questions.response_content: Wow!!! Thank you.
questions.user_language: {"Garmin Edge","TD loses the connection",workaround,"connect via BLE","Direto hanshaking","connect to Direto via ANT+","Start recording"}
